com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility

Class CityCoverageRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest<T>
      • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractListRequest<CityCoverageResult>
        • com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.CityCoverageRequest

  • public class CityCoverageRequest
extends AbstractListRequest<CityCoverageResult>
    Represents a request to retrieve public transit data coverage by city. All setter methods return the current instance, so these calls can be chained.

    IMPORTANT: Urban Mobility Coverage Search is a Beta feature. The related classes are subject to change without notice.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CityCoverageRequest.UpdateType
      Indicates if the result should contain only NEW or UPDATED cities (since given time).

    • Method Detail

      • setRequestCityDetailsEnabled

        public CityCoverageRequest setRequestCityDetailsEnabled(boolean details)
        Set if city details (such as population, available operators) should be returned. It is true by default.
        Parameters:
        details - true if city details should be returned, false otherwise
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setNearbyMax

        public CityCoverageRequest setNearbyMax(int nearbyMax)
        Set maximum number of cities returned in a separate "nearby" list. Cities with zero relevancy are included in this list. All cities with relevancy value of more than 0 are returned in the "main" cities list. By default, this value is not set, so no nearby cities list is returned.

        Note: Cities in the "nearby" list are returned without any details.

        Parameters:
        nearbyMax - number of nearby cities in response, must be greater than 0
        Returns:
        this request instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if nearbyMax is invalid.

      • setRadius

        public CityCoverageRequest setRadius(int radius)
        Sets the radius. in meters, that define the area of the search. It is 150,000 by default.
        Parameters:
        radius - area of the search, in meters, must be greater than or equal 0
        Returns:
        this request instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if radius is invalid.

      • setLocation

        public CityCoverageRequest setLocation(GeoCoordinate location)
        Sets the location of the center point for search. It is not set by default - returns all cities.
        Parameters:
        location - coordinates of center point for search
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setTime

        public CityCoverageRequest setTime(java.util.Date time)
        Sets a time filter for result cities. Use CityCoverageRequest.UpdateType parameter to specify how filtering behaves. If it will return cities created or updated since given time, or both (created or updated). It is not set by default - no time filtering.
        Parameters:
        time - date and time filter
        Returns:
        this request instance

      • setUpdateType

        public CityCoverageRequest setUpdateType(CityCoverageRequest.UpdateType updateType)
        Sets type of time filter, which determines if the result will contain new, updated, or both new and updated, cities (since the given time). By default CityCoverageRequest.UpdateType.ALL is used.
        Parameters:
        updateType - type of time filter
        Returns:
        this request instance
